targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "Threads_connected" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Threads_created" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM mysql_value WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND type_instance ='Threads_cached' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM mysql_value WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND type_instance ='Threads_running' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
